message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm asking for $20,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Hi Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $20,000 represents its full value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering our previous discussions and my budget constraints.
